title: Episode 95: The Development of the Ms. Pat Show, Part 1
description:
Ms. Pat's friend Jon Radler first heard her on Marc Maron, and knew she needed a TV show. He joins us to share the process of turning her stories into a TV show.

- Get the Crack Baby T-Shirt! https://www.mspatcomedy.com/product/crack-baby-t-shirt/

- Patreon: https://www.patreon.com/patdown
- Website: https://www.mspatcomedy.com/
